page.syntax: BMP as B = PNG_TO_BITMAP(B png_data[,C channel])

argument.name: channel
argument.description: Character. Flags Optional. Default = "C"; "C" = Combined, "R" = RGB only, "A" = Alpha blend only

page.description: Convert a png to a bitmap, optiona channel is default of (C)ombined, (R)gb only, (A)lpha blend only.
page.discussion: The PNG_TO_BITMAP() function converts a PNG formatted image in memory to a Windows Bitmap (.BMP) formatted image.
page.example: dim img as B dim img2 as B dim fptr as P dim fptr2 as P dim length as N fptr = file.open("C:\NextYear.png",FILE_RW_EXCLUSIVE) length = fptr.bytes_get() img = fptr.readb(length) img2 = png_to_bitmap(img) fptr2 = file.create("c:\NextYear.bmp",FILE_RW_EXCLUSIVE) fptr2.writeb(img2) fptr2.close() fptr.close()
